name: School Night of Fear
description:
School Night of Fear is a state-of fully 3D interactive game. DON'T DOWNLOAD THIS GAME! It's not what it looks like! Once you anger Mr. Johnson, there's no turning back, and if he get close to you... then game over! I'm warning you, if you end up playing this, avoid Mr. Johnson at ALL COSTS!

Controls

Use the WASD keys to move, and the mouse to turn. Left click to open doors and pick up items, F key to turn off and on the flashlight. Hold down shift to run (Keep an eye on your stamina bar!), and press space bar to quickly look behind you. Escape can be used to pause.

Credits

Game by Patricia Lepe

Tools used:

  • Unity
  • Adobe Photoshop
  • Audacity
  • Blender

Hmmm, I'm been thinking about it but we'll see. I can't promise anything.
